.. toctree::

Changelog
=========
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
This project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <http://semver.org/>`_.

[unreleased_]
-------------
Added
*****
- Readthedocs Documentation in docs/.
- Source code API in api/.

Fixed
*****
- Regex to allow space in the input string.
- Set and manipulate methods returns sodium object, help to chain and use all get methods.

Removed
********
- Adobe kuler API model removed as the service API is closed.

.. _unreleased: https://github.com/lokesh-coder/Sodium/tree/2.0.0
